Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
  Matrix

public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object

Judy Isaacs and Joyce Vogel This class represents a two dimensional Matrix

Constructor Summary
Matrix(int[][] array)
          Constructs a Matrix from a two-dimensional array; the dimensions as well as the values of this Matrix will be the same as the dimensions and values of the two-dimensional array.
Matrix(int size1, int size2)
          Constructs a size1 by size2 Matrix of zeroes.
 
Method Summary
 Matrix imageFilterAverage()
          Calculates and returns a copy of this Matrix after it has been filtered from noise.
 Matrix makeNegative()
          Calculates and returns a negative copy of this Matrix.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns a string representation of this Matrix.

Constructor Detail

Matrix

public Matrix(int[][] array)
Constructs a Matrix from a two-dimensional array; the dimensions as well as the values of this Matrix will be the same as the dimensions and values of the two-dimensional array.

Parameters:
array - a two dimensional array. It is the source of the initial values for Matrix

Matrix

public Matrix(int size1,
              int size2)
Constructs a size1 by size2 Matrix of zeroes.

Parameters:
size1 - number of rows in the Matrix
size2 - number of columns in the Matrix
Method Detail

imageFilterAverage

public Matrix imageFilterAverage()
Calculates and returns a copy of this Matrix after it has been filtered from noise. All pixels are represented by a number 0-255 inclusive.

Returns:
a copy of this Matrix after it has been filtered from noise

makeNegative

public Matrix makeNegative()
Calculates and returns a negative copy of this Matrix. All pixels are represented by a number 0-255 inclusive.

Returns:
a negative copy of this Matrix

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a string representation of this Matrix. All numbers appearing in the same row are separated by the tab key; all rows are separated by the '\n' char.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a string representation of this Matrix
